page.title: 01INTRODUCTION (1)
page.content: We in the 3rd year of{HEATHCOAT {MIDDLE SCHOOL}have found out information about the Halberton area. first of all we started to do an {Amenities Survey.}We did it by going around our area and listing all the amenities we saw We found that the area was very low in its amenities and there were very few shops.There are 2 filling stations and they get their fuel from the nearby {Esso Bulk Plant.}Both of the filling stations have general stores and also there is a repair garage. There are 6 shops comprising a{Hair {Stylist , 4 General Stores , Fish and {Chip shop and 2 Pubs in the area. } There is a small {First School}in Halberton which was built in 1849 ,and has only 25 children and 2 teachers . Near the school there is{ST. ANDREWS {CHURCH}.
